attributes.action: Ban at home fireworks for wildlife,pet and veteran safety
attributes.additional_details: Over the years people have been buying at home fireworks,they cause wildlife to die ,go into shock etc,they cause pets to go into shock and die, they cause war veterans to have ptsd flashbacks that can cause major trauma for them and family members..there’s numerous reasons why they should be banned.If you want fireworks go to a public display that take many precautions and give notice.
attributes.background: I would like the government to ban at home fireworks that are sold everywhere around the country.Children get there hands on them and these fireworks do more harm that good.They are very harmful to certain individuals and can even cause animal deaths.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
